column1: S106OE.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S106OE.DECK.  106. SURVEY NUMBER
S106OE.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S106OE.FORM.  1. S-106EU - ENLISTED MEN - UNITED STATES FORM 2. S-106EE - ENLISTED MEN - ETO FORM 3. S-106EH - ENLISTED MEN - CENTRAL PACIFIC FORM 4. S-106OU - OFFICERS - UNITED STATES FORM 5. S-10XXE - OFFICERS - EUROPEAN THEATER OF OPERATIONS FORM 6. S-106OH - OFFICERS - CENTRAL PACIFIC AREA FORM
S106OE.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR PRESENT GRADE?  1. FLIGHT OFFICER OR WARRANT OFFICER 2. SECOND LIEUTENANT 3. FIRST LIEUTENANT 4. CAPTAIN 5. RANK HIGHER THAN CAPTAIN 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q2. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN ON ACTIVE SERVICE AS A COMMISSIONED OFFICER IN THE ARMY?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 5 YEARS 7. OVER 5 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q3. WERE YOU SERVING IN THE ARMY AS AN ENLISTED MAN JUST BEFORE YOU WERE COMMISSIONED?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER I. IF YOU WERE SERVING IN THE ARMY AS AN ENLISTED MAN JUST BEFORE YOU WERE COMMISSIONED, PLEASE ANSWER THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS. IF YOU WERE NOT, OMIT THEM AND SKIP TO QUESTION 6.

S106OE.Q4. HOW WERE YOU FIRST TAKEN INTO THE ARMY?  1. I WAS DRAFTED 2. I VOLUNTEERED AFTER PEARL HARBOR 3. I VOLUNTEERED BEFORE PEARL HARBOR 4. I WAS IN THE NATIONAL GUARD 5. I WAS IN THE E.R.C. (ENLISTED RESERVE) 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q5. HOW MUCH ACTIVE SERVICE DID YOU SEE AS AN ENLISTED MAN BEFORE YOU RECEIVED YOUR COMMISSION?  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER TWO YEARS UP TO THREE YEARS 5. OVER THREE YEARS 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER I. EVERYONE SHOULD ANSWER THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS:
S106OE.Q6A. HAVE YOU SERVED OUTSIDE THE CONTINENTAL UNITED STATES IN THIS WAR?  1. YES, AS AN ENLISTED MAN 2. YES, AS AN OFFICER 3. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S106OE.Q6B. HAVE YOU BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT IN THIS WAR?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S106OE.Q7. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY?  01. 18 YEARS OR YOUNGER 02. 19 YEARS 03. 20 04. 21 05. 22 06. 23 07. 24 08. 25 09. 26-29 YEARS 10. 30-34 YEARS 11. 35 YEARS AND OLDER 00. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q8A. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY?  1. ON A FARM 2. IN THE COUNTRY BUT NOT ON A FARM 3. IN A VILLAGE WITH FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE 4. IN A SMALL CITY WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE 5. IN A CITY WITH BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE 6. IN A LARGE CITY WITH MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q8B. HOW LONG HAD YOU BEEN LIVING THERE BEFORE YOU ENTERED THE ARMY?  1. ONE YEAR OR LESS 2. OVER ONE YEAR UP TO TWO YEARS 3. OVER TWO YEARS UP TO THREE YEARS 4. OVER THREE YEARS UP TO FIVE YEARS 5. OVER FIVE YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q9. HOW MUCH EDUCATION HAVE YOU HAD?  1. LESS THAN 8TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 3. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 4. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 5. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 7. GRADUATE STUDY IN COLLEGE OR UNIVERSITY 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 10 AND 11 CODED TOGETHER.

S106OE.Q10. ARE YOU SINGLE, MARRIED, DIVORCED OR SEPARATED, OR WIDOWED? F. IF MARRIED:  Q.11. WERE YOU MARRIED BEFORE OR AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY?  1. SINGLE 2. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 3. WIDOWED 4. MARRIED BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 5. MARRIED AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY 0. NO ANSWER
S106OE.Q12. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAVE?  1. HAVE NO CHILDREN 2. HAVE ONE CHILD 3. HAVE TWO CHILDREN 4. HAVE THREE OR MORE CHILDREN 5. I'M NOT MARRIED 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q13. WHAT ARM OR SERVICE ARE YOU IN NOW?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED COMMAND 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY 09. ANTI-AIRCRAFT 10. AIR CORPS 11. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 12. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 13. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 14. MILITARY POLICE 15. TANK DESTROYER 16. OTHER 17. AUS, NMB, BI 00. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q14. HOW DID YOU RECEIVE YOUR COMMISSION?  1. FROM PILOT - BOMBARDIER - NAVIGATOR TRAINING 2. FROM AIR CORPS TECHNICAL SCHOOL 3. FROM OFFICER CANDIDATE SCHOOL 4. FROM R.O.T.C. OR C.M.T.C. 5. FROM WEST POINT 6. COMMISSIONED DIRECTLY FROM CIVILIAN LIFE 7. IN SOME OTHER WAY 8. NATIONAL GUARD 9. DIRECT FROM ENLISTED STATUS (OR FROM WARRANT OFFICER OR A WARRANT OFFICER APPOINTMENT) 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q15. IS THE WORK YOU ARE DOING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY ASSIGN- MENT RELATED EITHER TO YOUR PAST CIVILIAN EXPERIENCE OR TO WHAT YOU INTEND TO DO AFTER THE WAR?  1. YES, RELATED TO BOTH 2. YES, RELATED TO WHAT I DID BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 3. YES, RELATED TO WHAT I INTEND TO DO AFTER THE WAR 4. NO, NOT RELATED TO EITHER 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q16. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING WERE YOU DOING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY?  01. WORKING FULL-TIME FOR THE GOVERNMENT (FEDERAL, STATE, CITY, ETC.) 02. WORKING FULL-TIME FOR A RELATIVE (FATHER, UNCLE, ETC.) 03. WORKING FULL-TIME FOR SOME OTHER EMPLOYER (COMPANY, PERSON, ETC.) 04. WORKING FULL-TIME FOR MYSELF 05. GOING TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL 06. SOMETHING ELSE 07. PART-TIME WORK AND FULL-TIME SCHOOL (WHERE WORK WAS IMPORTANT) 08. UNEMPLOYED (ONLY IF FOR CONSIDERABLE LENGTH OF TIME) 09. C.C.C. OR W.P.A. 10. OWN BUSINESS AND FULL-TIME JOB (OWN SMALL SHOP OR FARM) 11. REGULAR ARMY 00. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q17A. PLEASE DESCRIBE THE LAST JOB YOU HAD BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY. WHAT WAS YOUR JOB CALLED? JUST WHAT DID YOU DO? E. OCCUPATION:  01. PROFESSIONAL (I.E., DOCTORS, LAWYERS, DENTISTS, ACCOUNTANTS, ENGINEERS, TEACHERS, ETC.) 02. SEMI-PROFESSIONALS (AVIATORS, COMMERCIAL ARTISTS, DRAFTSMEN, PHOTOGRAPHERS, ENTERTAINERS, ETC.) 03. SERVICE OCCUPATIONS (COOKS, WAITERS, BARBERS, GUARDS, POLICEMEN, ETC.) 04. AGRICULTURE 05. SKILLED OCCUPATIONS (TOOLMAKERS, CARPENTERS, PLUMBERS, PAINTERS, ETC.) 06. SEMI-SKILLED OCCUPATIONS (MOST FACTORY MACHINE OPERATORS, TRUCK-DRIVERS, ETC.) 07. UNSKILLED OCCUPATIONS (LABORERS, INCLUDING FACTORY WORKERS WHOSE JOB IS NOT SPECIFIED) 08. MANAGERS AND OFFICIALS (HIGHER TYPE WITH SUPERVISORY CAPACITY) 09. MERCHANTS, SHOPKEEPERS, TRADESMEN, ETC. (OWN BUSINESS) 10. CLERICAL 11. SALES PERSONS (INCLUDING MANAGERS OF SMALL CHAIN STORES) 12. MISCELLANEOUS UNCLASSIFIABLE (INCLUDES STUDENTS) 00. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q17C. ABOUT HOW LONG DID YOU DO THIS KIND OF WORK, EITHER ON THIS JOB OR OTHER JOBS?  1. LESS THAN 6 MONTHS 2. 6 MONTHS UP TO AND INCLUDING 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO AND INCLUDING 3 YEARS 4. OVER 3 YEARS UP TO AND INCLUDING 5 YEARS 5. OVER 5 YEARS UP TO AND INCLUDING 10 YEARS 6. OVER 10 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER P. HERE ARE SOME QUESTIONS ABOUT YOUR JOB PLANS FOR AFTER THE WAR. WE WANT TO KNOW ABOUT THE FIRST JOB YOU PLAN TO TAKE AFTER YOU LEAVE THE ARMY.
S106OE.Q18A. WHAT KIND OF WORK DO YOU THINK YOU WILL DO RIGHT AFTER THE WAR? (IF YOU ARE UNDECIDED, TELL WHAT YOU THINK YOU MIGHT DO.) E. INDUSTRY:  1. SCHOOL (STUDENTS ONLY) 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q18A. WHAT KIND OF WORK DO YOU THINK YOU WILL DO RIGHT AFTER THE WAR? (IF YOU ARE UNDECIDED, TELL WHAT YOU THINK YOU MIGHT DO.) E. INDUSTRY:  49 1. AGRICULTURE 1349 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q18A. WHAT KIND OF WORK DO YOU THINK YOU WILL DO RIGHT AFTER THE WAR? (IF YOU ARE UNDECIDED, TELL WHAT YOU THINK YOU MIGHT DO.) E. INDUSTRY:  197 1. AVIATION 1201 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q18A. WHAT KIND OF WORK DO YOU THINK YOU WILL DO RIGHT AFTER THE WAR? (IF YOU ARE UNDECIDED, TELL WHAT YOU THINK YOU MIGHT DO.) E. INDUSTRY:  8 1. RADIO (NOT SALES) 1390 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q18A. WHAT KIND OF WORK DO YOU THINK YOU WILL DO RIGHT AFTER THE WAR? (IF YOU ARE UNDECIDED, TELL WHAT YOU THINK YOU MIGHT DO.) E. INDUSTRY:  4 1. MINING 1394 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q18A. WHAT KIND OF WORK DO YOU THINK YOU WILL DO RIGHT AFTER THE WAR? (IF YOU ARE UNDECIDED, TELL WHAT YOU THINK YOU MIGHT DO.) E. INDUSTRY:  149 1. ARMY 1249 2. NOT CHOSEN

S106OE.Q18A. WHAT KIND OF WORK DO YOU THINK YOU WILL DO RIGHT AFTER THE WAR? (IF YOU ARE UNDECIDED, TELL WHAT YOU THINK YOU MIGHT DO.) E. INDUSTRY:  128 1. ARMY AND/OR SOMETHING ELSE (WILL BE USED ONLY AS PART OF A DOUBLE CODE) 1270 2. NOT CHOSEN

S106OE.Q18A. WHAT KIND OF WORK DO YOU THINK YOU WILL DO RIGHT AFTER THE WAR? (IF YOU ARE UNDECIDED, TELL WHAT YOU THINK YOU MIGHT DO.) E. INDUSTRY:  76 1. FULL-TIME SCHOOL AND/OR SOMETHING ELSE (WILL BE USED ONLY AS A PART OF A DOUBLE CODE) 1322 2. NOT CHOSEN

S106OE.Q18A. WHAT KIND OF WORK DO YOU THINK YOU WILL DO RIGHT AFTER THE WAR? (IF YOU ARE UNDECIDED, TELL WHAT YOU THINK YOU MIGHT DO.) E. INDUSTRY:  563 1. TRADE, TRANSPORTATION, CONSTRUCTION, MANUFACTURING OTHER THAN RADIO AND AVIATION. ONE MENTION (NOT LISTED ELSEWHERE) 835 2. NOT CHOSEN

S106OE.Q18A. WHAT KIND OF WORK DO YOU THINK YOU WILL DO RIGHT AFTER THE WAR? (IF YOU ARE UNDECIDED, TELL WHAT YOU THINK YOU MIGHT DO.) E. INDUSTRY:  110 1. TWO OR MORE MENTIONED BUT NOT INCLUDING SCHOOL OR ARMY (THIS MAY BE USED WHERE MAN APPEARS UNDECIDED AND APPARENTLY HAS LITTLE REAL INTENTION OF RETURNING TO SCHOOL OR ARMY) 1288 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q18A. WHAT KIND OF WORK DO YOU THINK YOU WILL DO RIGHT AFTER THE WAR? (IF YOU ARE UNDECIDED, TELL WHAT YOU THINK YOU MIGHT DO.) E. INDUSTRY:  64 1. NO INDUSTRY MENTIONED 1334 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q18A. WHAT KIND OF WORK DO YOU THINK YOU WILL DO RIGHT AFTER THE WAR? (IF YOU ARE UNDECIDED, TELL WHAT YOU THINK YOU MIGHT DO.) E. INDUSTRY:  41 1. NO ANSWER 1357 2. NOT CHOSEN

S106OE.V18A1. TYPE OF WORK:  01. SAME JOB OR TYPE OF WORK (OLD JOB OR OWN BUSINESS) - DEFINITE AND SPECIFIC PLAN 02. DIFFERENT JOB OR TYPE OF WORK - DEFINITE AND SPECIFIC PLAN 03. OWN BUSINESS OR FARM, NEW OR DIFFERENT - DEFINITE AND SPECIFIC PLAN 04. SAME OR DIFFERENT TYPE OF WORK - TWO ALTERNATIVE PLANS 05. OWN BUSINESS OR FARM OR SAME TYPE OF WORK - TWO ALTERNATIVE PLANS 06. OWN BUSINESS OR FARM OR DIFFERENT TYPE OF WORK - TWO ALTERNATIVE PLANS 07. SAME JOB MAYBE - NO DEFINITE OR SPECIFIC PLAN 08. DIFFERENT JOB MAYBE - NO DEFINITE OR SPECIFIC PLAN 09. OWN BUSINESS MAYBE - NO DEFINITE OR SPECIFIC PLAN 10. UNDECIDED OR NO DEFINITE PLAN WITH NO INDICATION WHETHER SAME OR DIFFERENT TYPE OF WORK 11. OWN BUSINESS (NEW OWNERSHIP) BUT IN THE SAME GENERAL LINE OF WORK AS PRE-WAR JOB 00. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q18B. DID YOU DO THIS KIND OF WORK BEFORE YOU ENTERED THE ARMY? IF YES, HOW LONG?  1. LESS THAN 6 MONTHS 2. 6 MONTHS UP TO AND INCLUDING 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO AND INCLUDING 3 YEARS 4. OVER 3 YEARS UP TO AND INCLUDING 5 YEARS 5. OVER 5 YEARS UP TO AND INCLUDING 10 YEARS 6. OVER 10 YEARS 7. YES, BUT NO TIME GIVEN 8. NO, I NEVER DID THIS KIND OF WORK 9. NO, BUT I'M LEARNING (OR HAVE LEARNED) THIS KIND OF WORK IN THE ARMY 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q19. HOW SURE DO YOU FEEL THAT AFTER THE WAR YOU WILL DO THE KIND OF WORK YOU DESCRIBED IN THE LAST QUESTION?  1. I'M ALMOST SURE I WILL 2. I PROBABLY WILL, BUT I MAY DO SOMETHING ELSE 3. I'M REALLY NOT AT ALL SURE WHAT I WILL DO 0. NO ANSWER
S106OE.Q20. DO YOU EXPECT TO WORK FOR YOURSELF OR FOR SOMEONE ELSE RIGHT AFTER YOU LEAVE THE ARMY?  1. I EXPECT TO WORK FOR MYSELF 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q20. DO YOU EXPECT TO WORK FOR YOURSELF OR FOR SOMEONE ELSE RIGHT AFTER YOU LEAVE THE ARMY?  120 1. I EXPECT TO WORK FOR THE GOVERNMENT (FEDERAL, STATE, CITY, ETC.) 1278 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q20. DO YOU EXPECT TO WORK FOR YOURSELF OR FOR SOMEONE ELSE RIGHT AFTER YOU LEAVE THE ARMY?  57 1. I EXPECT TO WORK FOR A RELATIVE (FATHER, UNCLE, ETC.) 1341 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q20. DO YOU EXPECT TO WORK FOR YOURSELF OR FOR SOMEONE ELSE RIGHT AFTER YOU LEAVE THE ARMY?  412 1. I EXPECT TO WORK FOR SOME OTHER EMPLOYER (COMPANY, PERSON, ETC.) 986 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q20. DO YOU EXPECT TO WORK FOR YOURSELF OR FOR SOMEONE ELSE RIGHT AFTER YOU LEAVE THE ARMY?  184 1. I PLAN TO GO TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL 1214 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q20. DO YOU EXPECT TO WORK FOR YOURSELF OR FOR SOMEONE ELSE RIGHT AFTER YOU LEAVE THE ARMY?  177 1. I PLAN TO STAY IN THE ARMY 1221 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q20. DO YOU EXPECT TO WORK FOR YOURSELF OR FOR SOMEONE ELSE RIGHT AFTER YOU LEAVE THE ARMY?  173 1. I DON'T HAVE ANY DEFINITE PLANS 1225 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q20. DO YOU EXPECT TO WORK FOR YOURSELF OR FOR SOMEONE ELSE RIGHT AFTER YOU LEAVE THE ARMY?  43 1. ARMY AND OTHER CODE 1355 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q20. DO YOU EXPECT TO WORK FOR YOURSELF OR FOR SOMEONE ELSE RIGHT AFTER YOU LEAVE THE ARMY?  15 1. SCHOOL AND OTHER CODE 1383 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q20. DO YOU EXPECT TO WORK FOR YOURSELF OR FOR SOMEONE ELSE RIGHT AFTER YOU LEAVE THE ARMY?  13 1. NO DEFINITE PLANS AND OTHER CODE 1385 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q20. DO YOU EXPECT TO WORK FOR YOURSELF OR FOR SOMEONE ELSE RIGHT AFTER YOU LEAVE THE ARMY?  10 1. COMBINATION OF CODES (COLUMNS 51-54 ABOVE) 1388 2. NOT CHOSEN
S106OE.Q20. DO YOU EXPECT TO WORK FOR YOURSELF OR FOR SOMEONE ELSE RIGHT AFTER YOU LEAVE THE ARMY?  24 1. NO ANSWER 1374 2. NOT CHOSEN

S106OE.Q21. DO YOU THINK YOU WILL TRY TO GET A GOVERNMENT (FEDERAL, STATE, CITY, ETC.) JOB AFTER THE WAR?  1. I HAVE A GOVERNMENT JOB WAITING FOR ME, WHICH I EXPECT TO TAKE 2. I AM DEFINITELY GOING TO TRY TO GET A GOVERNMENT JOB 3. I WOULD LIKE A GOVERNMENT JOB, BUT I AM NOT SURE I WILL TRY TO GET ONE 4. I WOULD TRY IF I COULDN'T GET SOME OTHER JOB I WOULD LIKE 5. I AM NOT AT ALL INTERESTED IN A GOVERNMENT JOB 0. NO ANSWER
S106OE.Q22. HAVE YOU EVER WORKED ON A FARM FOR AS MUCH AS A YEAR?  1. YES, ON A FULL-TIME BASIS 2. YES, ON A PART-TIME BASIS 3. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q23. DO YOU THINK YOU WILL DO FARMING WHEN YOU GET OUT OF THE ARMY?  1. YES, I AM ALMOST SURE I WILL FARM FULL-TIME 2. I EXPECT TO FARM, BUT TO HAVE A STEADY JOB AT THE SAME TIME 3. I MAY FARM, BUT I'M NOT SURE 4. NO, I'M ALMOST SURE I WON'T FARM 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q24. DO YOU EXPECT TO BUY OR TO INHERIT A FARM IN THE NEXT FIVE OR TEN YEARS?  1. I DON'T EXPECT TO BUY OR INHERIT A FARM 2. I ALREADY OWN A FARM 3. I EXPECT TO BUY A FARM 4. I EXPECT TO INHERIT A FARM 5. I DON'T KNOW 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S106OE.Q25. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU HAVE HAD AS MUCH SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AS YOU WANT, OR WOULD YOU LIKE TO GO BACK TO SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AFTER THE WAR?  1. I HAVE HAD AS MUCH SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AS I WANT 2. I WOULD LIKE TO GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE 3. I WOULD LIKE TO GO BACK TO PART-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q26. IT HAS BEEN PLANNED THAT THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT WILL PAY TUITION AND OTHER EDUCATIONAL EXPENSES PLUS A LIVING ALLOWANCE OF $50 PER MONTH TO VETERANS WHO QUALIFY AND WANT TO CONTINUE THEIR SCHOOLING. DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AFTER THE WAR, IF THIS IS DONE?  1. I EXPECT TO GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL WHETHER OR NOT THE GOVERNMENT HELPS ME 2. I WILL GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL IF THE GOVERNMENT PROVIDES THIS HELP 3. I WILL NOT GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL EVEN IF THE GOVERNMENT WOULD HELP ME 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q27. REGARDLESS OF WHAT YOU WOULD LIKE TO DO, DO YOU THINK YOU WILL ACTUALLY GO BACK TO SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AFTER THE WAR?  1. YES, TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE 2. YES, TO PART-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I WILL GO BACK TO SCHOOL OR COLLEGE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q28. IF YOU COULD KEEP YOUR COMMISSION AFTER THE WAR, DO YOU THINK YOU MIGHT WANT TO MAKE A CAREER OF THE ARMY?  1. YES, I WOULD WANT TO VERY MUCH 2. YES, I MIGHT WANT TO BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I WOULD WANT TO 4. NO, I WOULD NOT WANT TO AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q29. DO YOU THINK YOU MIGHT WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY, AS AN OFFICER, FOR A YEAR OR TWO AFTER THE WAR?  1. YES, I WOULD WANT TO VERY MUCH 2. YES, I MIGHT WANT TO BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I'D WANT TO 4. NO, I WOULD NOT WANT TO AT ALL 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S106OE.Q30. DO YOU THINK YOU MIGHT WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY AS AN OFFICER AFTER THE WAR EVEN IF YOU HAD TO ACCEPT A LOWER GRADE THAN YOU NOW HOLD?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q31. WOULD YOU CONSIDER STAYING IN THE ARMY AS A NONCOM AFTER THE WAR?  1. I WOULD BE WILLING TO STAY AS A NONCOM PERMANENTLY 2. I WOULD BE WILLING TO STAY AS A NONCOM IF I COULD LATER BE RECOMMISSIONED 3. I WOULD NOT CONSIDER STAYING AS A NONCOM 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q32. IF YOU WERE FAIRLY CERTAIN OF GETTING A GOOD CIVILIAN JOB WHEN THE WAR IS OVER, DO YOU STILL THINK YOU WOULD STAY IN THE ARMY?  1. YES, I WOULD STILL WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY 2. I MIGHT WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I WOULD TAKE THE CIVILIAN JOB 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q33. WOULD YOU WANT TO SERVE OVERSEAS AS AN OFFICER WITH AN ARMY OF OCCUPATION FOR 3 TO 5 YEARS AFTER THE WAR?  1. YES, I WOULD WANT TO VERY MUCH 2. I MIGHT WANT TO, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I WOULDN'T WANT TO 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q34. IF YOU ARE MARRIED, HOW WOULD YOUR WIFE FEEL ABOUT YOUR STAYING IN THE ARMY AS AN OFFICER AFTER THE WAR?  1. SHE WOULD LIKE TO HAVE ME STAY 2. IT WOULDN'T MATTER MUCH TO HER 3. SHE WOULD NOT LIKE TO HAVE ME STAY 4. I DON'T KNOW HOW SHE WOULD FEEL 5. I AM NOT MARRIED 0. NO ANSWER
S106OE.Q35. IF YOU THINK YOU WILL WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY, WHAT ARE YOUR REASONS FOR WANTING TO STAY?  1. COMMENT WRITTEN IN 2. I DO NOT THINK I WILL WANT TO STAY 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q36. DO YOU THINK YOU WILL ACTUALLY STAY IN THE ARMY, OF YOUR OWN CHOICE, AFTER THE WAR?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER I. IF YOU ARE A FLYING OFFICER, PLEASE ANSWER THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS: IF NOT, TURN TO QUESTION 42.

S106OE.Q37. WOULD YOU WANT TO REMAIN IN THE AIR CORPS AFTER THE WAR IF YOU COULD RETAIN YOUR FLYING STATUS?  1. I WOULD WANT TO STAY IN THE AIR CORPS EVEN IF I COULD NOT RETAIN MY FLYING STATUS 2. I WOULD STAY ONLY IF I COULD KEEP MY FLYING STATUS 3. I WOULD WANT TO STAY IN THE AIR CORPS, BUT NOT AS A FLYING OFFICER 4. NO, I WOULDN'T WANT TO STAY IN THE AIR CORPS 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER X. COL. 80 NOT USED. CARD 2
S106OE.CARD.  2. CARD TWO
S106OE.DECK.  106. SURVEY NUMBER
S106OE.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S106OE.FORM.  1. S-106EU - ENLISTED MEN - UNITED STATES FORM 2. S-106EE - ENLISTED MEN - ETO FORM 3. S-106EH - ENLISTED MEN - CENTRAL PACIFIC AREA FORM 4. S-106OU - OFFICERS - UNITED STATES FORM 5. S-10XXE - OFFICERS - EUROPEAN THEATER OF OPERATIONS FORM 6. S-106OH - OFFICERS - CENTRAL PACIFIC FORM

S106OE.Q38. IF FLYING PAY WERE CUT OUT AFTER THE WAR AND YOU COULD GET ONLY THE REGULAR PAY FOR YOUR GRADE, WOULD YOU STILL WANT TO STAY IN THE AIR CORPS, WITH FLYING STATUS, AFTER THE WAR?  1. I WOULD WANT TO STAY EVEN IF FLYING PAY WERE CUT OUT 2. I WOULD WANT TO STAY ONLY IF I COULD CONTINUE TO DRAW FLYING PAY 3. I PROBABLY WOULD NOT WANT TO STAY REGARDLESS OF WHETHER OR NOT I COULD DRAW FLYING PAY 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q39. WOULD YOU CONSIDER SIGNING UP TO REMAIN IN THE AIR CORPS AFTER THE WAR IF YOUR FIRST ASSIGNMENT WAS OUTSIDE THE CONTINENTAL UNITED STATES?  1. YES, I WOULD PROBABLY SIGN UP 2. I MIGHT, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I WOULDN'T CONSIDER SIGNING UP 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER
S106OE.Q40. IF YOU WERE OFFERED NOW AN APPOINTMENT AS AN OFFICER IN THE REGULAR ARMY AFTER THE WAR, WOULD YOU APPLY NOW?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q41. WOULD YOU APPLY NOW FOR AN APPOINTMENT AS AN OFFICER IN THE REGULAR ARMY AFTER THE WAR IF YOU KNEW FOR SURE THAT YOU COULD HAVE A LEAVE OF A MONTH OR TWO IN THE UNITED STATES BEFORE UNDERTAKING YOUR NEW ASSIGNMENT?  1. I WOULD PROBABLY APPLY EVEN IF I COULD NOT GET A LEAVE IN THE UNITED STATES BEFORE REPORTING ON MY NEW ASSIGNMENT 2. I WOULD APPLY ONLY IF I WAS SURE OF HAVING A LEAVE IN THE UNITED STATES AFTER THE WAR IS OVER 3. I WOULD NOT APPLY FOR AN APPOINTMENT 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER I. EVERYONE SHOULD ANSWER THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS:

S106OE.Q42. IN WHAT STATE OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY? E. SECTION:  01. NEW ENGLAND 02. MIDDLE ATLANTIC 03. EAST NORTH CENTRAL 04. WEST NORTH CENTRAL 05. SOUTH ATLANTIC 06. EAST SOUTH CENTRAL 07. WEST SOUTH CENTRAL 08. MOUNTAIN 09. PACIFIC 10. FOREIGN - U.S. POSSESSIONS 11. FOREIGN - NOT U.S. 12. U.S. - STATE NOT SPECIFIED 00. NO ANSWER
S106OE.Q43A. WERE YOU LIVING IN THE STATE YOU NAMED ABOVE JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q43B. IF NOT, WHAT STATE WERE YOU LIVING IN JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY?  01. NEW ENGLAND 02. MIDDLE ATLANTIC 03. EAST NORTH CENTRAL 04. WEST NORTH CENTRAL 05. SOUTH ATLANTIC 06. EAST SOUTH CENTRAL 07. WEST SOUTH CENTRAL 08. MOUNTAIN 09. PACIFIC 10. FOREIGN - U.S. POSSESSIONS 11. FOREIGN - NOT U.S. 12. U.S. - STATE NOT SPECIFIED 00. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q44. WHAT STATE IN THE UNITED STATES DO YOU THINK YOU WILL LIVE IN RIGHT AFTER YOU GET OUT OF THE ARMY?  01. NEW ENGLAND 02. MIDDLE ATLANTIC 03. EAST NORTH CENTRAL 04. WEST NORTH CENTRAL 05. SOUTH ATLANTIC 06. EAST SOUTH CENTRAL 07. WEST SOUTH CENTRAL 08. MOUNTAIN 09. PACIFIC 10. FOREIGN - U.S. POSSESSIONS 11. FOREIGN - NOT U.S. 12. U.S. - STATE NOT SPECIFIED 00. NO ANSWER
S106OE.V44A. COMBINATION OF QUESTIONS 42-44.  1. SAME STATE AS IN Q.42 2. SAME STATE AS IN Q.43 3. SOME OTHER STATE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q45. HOW SURE DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU WILL ACTUALLY LIVE IN THE STATE YOU NAMED IN QUESTION 43*  1. I AM ALMOST CERTAIN I WILL LIVE THERE 2. I WILL PROBABLY LIVE THERE, BUT I MAY GO TO SOME OTHER STATE 3. I AM REALLY NOT AT ALL SURE WHERE I WILL LIVE 0. NO ANSWER

S106OE.Q46. AFTER THE WAR, DO YOU PLAN TO GO BACK AND LIVE IN THE SAME PLACE - THE SAME LOCAL AREA, SAY WITHIN 5 OR 10 MILES OF WHERE YOU LIVED BEFORE YOU ENTERED THE ARMY?  1.
